title: Surviving The Biker
description: The story of Adriana and Trevor continues. Will she have the courage to fight for her man and will Trevor make the right decisions, involving the women in his life?Also - The war between the Devil's Rangers and the Gold Vipers comes to a climax. **This book is intended for readers 18 years old or older due to the explicit language, sexual situations, and violence that may be upsetting to some readers.
author: Cassie Alexandra
